thread.section_title: 1K Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: No bathroom door!
thread.title_full: No bathroom door! - Review of 1K Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WBK_BR2016
title: No bathroom door!
text:
Have to say this is a lovely hotel and very modern rooms. So modern there is no bathroom door. The toilet is just out there.
It's really weird and really uncomfortable when traveling with friends. This was not noted in any of the other reviews I read.
We even checked the room across the hall when they were cleaning it. No bathroom door.
I asked when we checked out what the deal was and the receptionist just shrugged.
It was a good stay....but too weird to ever book again.
Room Tip: The bathrooms don't have doors so the toilets are just open to the bedrooms See more room tips
